org.ops4j.peaberry.internal
Class ServiceMatcher

java.lang.Object
  org.ops4j.peaberry.internal.ServiceMatcher

public final class ServiceMatcher
extends java.lang.Object

Provide matchers and other utility methods for Service annotations.

Returns:
